dct_description_sm: Hungary. M. Kir. Allami Terkepeszet. Hungary. Royal Hungerian State Cartographical Institute. Relief is shown by form lines and shaded relief. Municipal districts are shown. Legend includes English, German, and Italian. Insets: Budapest Keruleti Beoszatasa = District devision of Budapest, Az. I. Ker. Taban Varosrendezesi Terve = I. District - Taban - Town regulation plan. Index of points of interest. Verso: street index, and index of points of interest in Hungarian, Italian, and French.
